channel.title: hugo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Setting up mathjax for hugo
item.description: Problem Adding mathjax support for posts Solution Modify the current theme Add a partial template Add a parameter called mathjax: true in the frontmatter Details Modifying the current theme Note that the current theme is set in config.tolm theme = "ananke" def add: return 1+1
